metadata.title: CVE-2020-12392 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The 'Copy as cURL' feature of Devtools' network tab did not properly escapethe HTTP POST data of a request, which can be controlled by the website. Ifa user used the 'Copy as cURL' feature and pasted the command into aterminal, it could have resulted in the disclosure of local files. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 68.8, Firefox < 76, and Thunderbird <68.8.0.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
